post.author: 코스카
post.content:
Status:  Full Time, Temporary/Contract/Project     Reference Code:  web-364604  

Job Location: Toronto  

H.I.Next is looking for a Developer who is interested in joining a growing development team geared towards Java technology and providing innovative solutions to the healthcare market. This position will provide the developer with professional growth and the responsibility to deliver application and integration code to Internet and Intranet customer environments.

Responsibilities

- Object-oriented analysis, design, programming and documentation.
- Participation on development and project teams.
- Written design documentation - ie. UML.
- Interaction with customers.
- Dedication to produce quality code to project timelines.

Skills & Experience

- Java J2SE and J2EE (2+ years)
- RDBMS technologies - SQL, ODBC, JDBC (2+ years)
- MS SQL or Oracle
- XML (preferable)
- Web Server technologies - JSP, Servlets (2+ years)
- Microsoft Windows NT, 2000 (2+ years)
- Network technologies (2+ years)
- UML modeling (preferable)
- Health Language 7 (HL7) - (preferred)

Other

- University Degree in Computer Science - or related (preferred)


Contact Information :.
H.I.Next Inc.
517 Kingston Road
Toronto ON M4L 1V5
post.title: Java Developer
